DOC.brief_summary: Can ultrasound machine use perform diagnostic lumbar medial branch block ?
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Guided Diagnostic Lumbar Medial Branch Blocks
DOC.detailed_description: The diagnostic lumbar medial branch block low back radiate low extremity due lumbar facet joint pain traditionally do fluoroscopic guidance . Some recent study show diagnostic lumbar medial branch may alternatively do ultrasound guidance . This propose technique many advantage , avoid radiation exposure decrease wait period patient pain procedure low back pain . The time take , patient ' satisfaction score , pain score , distance needle tip place ultrasound ideal position visualize fluoroscopy measure . This study do 2 part . The first part determine landmarks ultrasound . It involve use 5 cadaver . The second part study involve 25 patient . The needle place initially ultrasound verify C-arm fluoroscopy . Certain criterion use determine feasibility , example , le 20 minute , less 5 mm .
DOC.criteria: Low back and/or leg pain due possible lumbar facet joint disease patient BMI > 35 coagulopathy allergy local anesthetic ultrasound gel patient unable fill post procedure pain diary
